snippet.title: Infinity: HexaDome Tactics - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Infinity: HexaDome Tactics is a PvP turn-based tactics game set in Corvus Belli's Infinity Universe. Pick your champions and fight in 1v1 turn-based matches. Send your fighters to the arena, position them, create synergies, and give the crowd a brutal show! Unlock your ultimate attacks, influence the course of the game, and dominate the HexaDome!

Coming to Steam & Steam Deck in 2025!

✅ Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1498550?utm_source=youtube&utm_content=trailer2 
🎮 Request access to beta playtests: https://www.thehexadome.com
💬 Be part of the community: https://discord.gg/utyFJxVnCg
🐦 Follow on X: https://twitter.com/Blindspot_Games
📱 TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blindspot_games 


© 2024. All rights reserved. Developed by Blindspot Games.
https://www.blindspot-games.com
